revised_title: A Detailed Study of Cinnamon Varieties in Ceylon
tldr: The article provides a detailed account of the various types of cinnamon trees found in Ceylon, their characteristics, and their uses. The author, a chief inspector of the cinnamon trade and manufacture, describes nine different types of cinnamon, their growth conditions, and their medicinal properties. The article also discusses the process of identifying and separating the different types of cinnamon for export.
